channel.title: CVE Feed for Synology -- Synology Photo Station
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Synology -- Synology Photo Station

item.title: CVE-2017-11162|2024-08-05T17:57:57.917Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in synphotoio in Synology Photo Station before 6.7.4-3433 and 6.3-2968 allows remote authenticated users to read arbitrary files via unspecified vectors.

item.title: CVE-2017-11153|2024-08-05T17:57:58.039Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: Deserialization vulnerability in synophoto_csPhotoMisc.php in Synology Photo Station before 6.7.3-3432 and 6.3-2967 allows remote attackers to gain administrator privileges via a crafted serialized payload.

item.title: CVE-2017-16769|2024-08-05T20:35:21.186Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: Exposure of private information vulnerability in Photo Viewer in Synology Photo Station 6.8.1-3458 allows remote attackers to obtain metadata from password-protected photographs via the map viewer mode.

item.title: CVE-2017-11152|2024-08-05T17:57:57.976Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: Directory traversal vulnerability in PixlrEditorHandler.php in Synology Photo Station before 6.7.3-3432 and 6.3-2967 allows remote attackers to write arbitrary files via the path parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-12071|2024-08-05T18:28:15.785Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: Server-side request forgery (SSRF) vulnerability in file_upload.php in Synology Photo Station before 6.7.4-3433 and 6.3-2968 allows remote authenticated users to download arbitrary local files via the url parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-9552|2024-08-05T17:11:02.282Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: A design flaw in authentication in Synology Photo Station 6.0-2528 through 6.7.1-3419 allows local users to obtain credentials via cmdline. Synology Photo Station employs the synophoto_dsm_user program to authenticate username and password by "synophoto_dsm_user --auth USERNAME PASSWORD", and local users are able to obtain credentials by sniffing "/proc/*/cmdline".

item.title: CVE-2017-11161|2024-08-05T17:57:57.989Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: Multiple SQL injection vulnerabilities in Synology Photo Station before 6.7.4-3433 and 6.3-2968 allow remote attackers to execute arbitrary SQL commands via the (1) article_id parameter to label.php; or (2) type parameter to synotheme.php.

item.title: CVE-2017-11154|2024-08-05T17:57:57.677Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: Unrestricted file upload vulnerability in PixlrEditorHandler.php in Synology Photo Station before 6.7.3-3432 and 6.3-2967 allows remote attackers to create arbitrary PHP scripts via the type parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-9555|2024-08-05T17:11:02.273Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in PixlrEditorHandler.php in Synology Photo Station before 6.7.0-3414 allows remote attackers to inject arbitrary web script or HTML via the image parameter.

item.title: CVE-2017-11151|2024-08-05T17:57:57.985Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: A vulnerability in synotheme_upload.php in Synology Photo Station before 6.7.3-3432 and 6.3-2967 allows remote attackers to upload arbitrary files without authentication via the logo_upload action.

item.title: CVE-2017-11155|2024-08-05T17:57:58.052Z -- synology -- synology%20photo%20station
item.description: An information exposure vulnerability in index.php in Synology Photo Station before 6.7.3-3432 and 6.3-2967 allows remote attackers to obtain sensitive system information via unspecified vectors.
